title: Google Analytics Data API v1beta - Pivot Type
description: Describes the visible dimension columns and rows in the report response

fieldNames.description: Dimension names for visible columns in the report response

orderBys.description: Specifies how dimensions are ordered in the pivot

offset.description: The row count of the start row

limit.description: The number of unique combinations of dimension values to return

metricAggregations.description: Aggregate the metrics by dimensions in this pivot

metadata.description: Defines pivot configurations for pivot reports
